Yes, here are some tips on how to make your artwork more visible and stand out on social media platforms:

1. Consistency: Consistency is key when it comes to promoting your artwork online. Try to post regularly and maintain a consistent style to build a strong brand. 2. Engage with your audience: Engaging with your audience can help you build a community around your artwork. Respond to comments and messages, and show interest in other artists' work as well. 3. Use hashtags: Hashtags are a powerful tool to help your artwork get discovered by a wider audience. Research popular and relevant hashtags in your niche and include them in your posts. 4. Collaborate with other artists: Collaborating with other artists can help you reach a new audience and build valuable relationships in the industry. 5. Experiment with different formats: Don't be afraid to experiment with different formats and mediums to showcase your artwork. Consider creating time-lapse videos or behind-the-scenes content to give your audience a peek into your creative process. 6. Tailor content to each platform: Each social media platform has its own unique strengths and audience. Tailor your content to each platform to maximize engagement and reach. Remember, getting your artwork more visibility on social media requires hard work and persistence. Keep promoting your artwork, try new things and don't be afraid to take risks.
